metadata.title: CVE-2016-3876 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: providers/settings/SettingsProvider.java in Android 6.x before 2016-09-01and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 allows physically proximate attackers to bypassthe SAFE_BOOT_DISALLOWED protection mechanism and boot to safe mode via theAndroid Debug Bridge (adb) tool, aka internal bug 29900345.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
